articles.author: CGTN,China Global Television Network
articles.title: NASA reveals crew for 2024 flight around moon - CGTN
articles.description: NASA on Monday revealed the names of the astronauts – three Americans and one Canadian – who will fly around the moon next year, a prelude to returning humans to the lunar surface for the first time in a half century.
articles.content: NASA revealed the names on Monday of the astronauts three Americans and one Canadian who will fly around the moon next year, a prelude to returning humans to the lunar surface for the first time in a… [+2009 chars]
